about_the_game:
Synopsis:

In RAVENSBURG step into the shadows as a vampire in a city took over by a terrifying cult. This Gothic horror RPG immerses you in a Lovecraftian tale with anime aesthetics and attractive characters blending into a world that feels both unique and familiar. Gather your party from a wide cast of 13 distintive companions, each with their own personality, agenda, and priorities, forge complex alliances, friendships or more with them as you work together to reclaim the city.

Along the way, meet all sort of bizarre personalities—friends or foes—that will try to help or stop you as you walk through the streets of a civilization undone by the cosmic forces of demiurgic chaos!

Features:

  • Lovecraftian Horror x Anime: The best of anime-inspired visuals and characters with the best of Gothic and Lovecraftian horror mixed in a single game.

  • Form Your Perfect Team: Assemble your party from a cast of 13 playable characters. Each character brings unique skills and abilities you can customize.

  • Relationship System: Develop your relation with your companions, each with their own stories, ambitions, and secrets. Gain their loyalty or affection, either through deeds or interactions with them.

  • Thrilling Main Story: Uncover the dark truth behind the cult's power through a layered narrative filled with Lovecraftian mysteries and Charismatic Antagonists.

  • Stylish Gothic Art & Atmosphere: The femenine beauty of holy statues clashes with the atrocities committed by the Cult and decadent buildings towering the dark sky in this richly detailed world.

  • Open World and Eldritch Mystery: Investigate chilling encounters, solve side quests, and confront the city's horrors using your own skills and strategies to shape your journey with open-ended freedom.

  • Unforgiving Combat: Engage in intense turn-based battles against unspeakable horrors. Use your resources strategically to survive deadly encounters, unlock new districts, and upgrade your party’s skills and equipment.

  • Mansion Exploration: Discover +25 unique rooms in Ravenstein, the Gothic mansion that serves as your main base. Each offering lore, new skills, resources and opportunities to interact with your companions.

  • Original Soundtrack: A haunting, melancholic but energic soundtrack composed by the talented composer Devil Mistakes.

Enjoy the thrill of uncovering hidden horrors while making friends and enemies in a doomed city plagued by secrets beyond compression!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game takes place in a city taken over by a heretic cult. As such, contains explicit representations of violence, gore and blood. It also contains: vulgar language, use of alcohol, tabacco and other drugs, nudity and sexual content.

The story is set in an alternate 19th century fantasy world and it might represent behaviours and attitudes proper of that historical period.

short_description: RAVENSBURG is a haunting RPG where you play as a vampire. Here Lovecraftian Horror meets Anime. Liberate a cult-ridden city, uncover mysteries, and fight horrors beyond imagination while befriending attractive companions. Unravel a gothic mansion, and explore the city’s darkest depths.
